Name: kushBans
Title: Peace
Review: This mosque is a place where you'll find peace and internal happiness. Baba listens to you and prays for you !!

Name: 592abck
Title: Historic place
Review: Historic place to visit. Not much to see here but one must visit it considering its historic importance.

Name: Blitzkrieg3
Title: Quaint Mosque
Review: Aurangzeb Mosque is a quaint mosque is Lucknow, which belongs to the times of Aurangzeb. The mosque was built on the orders of Aurangzeb, who wanted to build a place to offer prayers for the public. Today, the mosque needs some maintenance but one can still get glimpses of old world charm in it.

Name: infojonny
Title: Mosque
Review: This Aurangzeb mosque is very old which was made by the king Aurangzeb the structure which is made is beautiful

Name: credit356
Title: Historical place
Review: This  has got great  historical importance as it  belonged to  Auranagazeb time. The   architecture  reflects our  cultural  values , which  has  inherited from  Mughals. The  place is  maintained well

Name: mhussain_bohra
Title: Heritage Mosque
Review: This is one of the oldest mosque in Lucknow. NIce lush hills behind the mosque and i really liked the white dome of the mosque. It is a nice historical and heritage site in Lucknow.

Name: abhayverma2007
Title: Aurangzeb's Mosque
Review: Easy to reach by Ricksaw or auto ricksaw. Aurangzeb's Mosque is located at Hussainabad in Lucknow. Situated near the well-known Bara Imambara, this mosque is a fine example of the Indo-Muslim architecture
